feed.title: Ente Photos Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: photos-v0.9.53
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [mob] Fix faceSync issue due to parsing failure by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3799
  • [mob] Reduce noise from sentry by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3802
  • [mob][photos] Revert onnx preprocessing by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3818
  • [mob][auth] Fix detection of default locale by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3819

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/photos-v0.9.52...photos-v0.9.53

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: photos-v0.9.58
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • ML Lite by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3838
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3862
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3869
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3917
  • [mob] Handle 404 for multipart failure by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3923
  • [mob] Fix nav bug during person label assignment by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3931
  • Copy by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3930
  • [mob] Fix date parsing for batched photos from signal by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3945
  • [mob][photos] UI tweaks on pricing page by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3962
  • [mob] Prioritize fetch for already indexed files by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3967
  • [mob][photos] Hierarchical search ✨ by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3969

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/photos-v0.9.53...photos-v0.9.58

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: photos-v0.9.65
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Media extension fix for deeplinks by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3584
  • [mob][photos] Hierarchical search ✨ by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3969
  • [mob][photos] Fix cast not working on android (Pair with PIN option) by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3979
  • [mob] Imporve remote face sync by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3990
  • [mob][photos] Concatenate strings more efficiently by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3985
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4008
  • [mob] Handle 401 during multipart failure by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4015
  • [mob] Clean up multipart upload on put or update error by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4021
  • Ml banner by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4039
  • [mob][image-editor] dismiss page on save edits by @prateekmedia in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4036
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4069
  • [mob] Fix market URI on mobile by @nugrahayoga in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4054
  • [mob][photos] Faces UI enhancement by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4073
  • Ml sync fix by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4027
  • Update apple-app-site-association for opening public link album in-app. by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4093
  • [mob][photos] Fix ConcurrentModificationError by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4095
  • [mob[ Added doc for mobile translations + added 2 new source string… by @simondubrulle in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4040
  • [mob][photos] Fix blank screen coming up right after freeing up space when deleting in batches by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4113
  • [mob] Refactor UX for saving and editing person by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4126
  • [mobile][photos] Extracted hardcoded english strings + improved trans… by @simondubrulle in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4118
  • [mob][auth] Send signup as purpose during registration by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4133
  • [mob][photos] extract remaining strings + localization of 'MagicFilters' by @simondubrulle in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4150
  • [mob][photos] Fix #2894 - Edited image resolution by @simondubrulle in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4153
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4163
  • [mob] Fix UX issues in edit person by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4167
  • [API] Remove trailing slash from inconsistent cast endpoints by @mnvr in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4179
  • [mob] Refresh UI when person is changed by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4182
  • [mob][photos] Implement deep linking for public links by @AmanRajSinghMourya in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/3386
  • [mob] Face thumbnails by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4170
  • [mob][photos] Fix incorrect condition + show permission dialog to allow link-in-app in debug mode too by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4189
  • [mob][photos] Quick fix undo by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4192
  • [API] Add Cache-control: no-store to API responses by @mnvr in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4197/pull/4200
  • [mob][photos] Fix build failing by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4199e/pull/4206
  • [mob][photos] Fix edit person screen clipping by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4207
  • [mob][photos] Fix clipping issues + other minor changes by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4201
  • [mob][photos] Fix ml banner by @laurenspriem in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4212
  • [mob][photos] Minor UX improvement by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4213
  • [mob] Enable fallback to TOTP if both passkey & totp are enabled by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4210
  • [mob][photos] Update change log by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4215
  • [mob] Fix person cover refresh issue by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4216
  • [mob] Bump version v0.9.65 by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4217

New Contributors

  • @nugrahayoga made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4054
  • @simondubrulle made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4040

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/photos-v0.9.58...photos-v0.9.65

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: photos-v0.9.66
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [mob] Enable translation for Ukrainian & Vietnamese by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4223
  • [mob][photos] Fix bug when clicking on 'collect' in shared tab to collect photos by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4229
  • [mob][photos] Fix misaligned hint text in search bar by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4232
  • [mob][photos] Fix video not changing in viewer after deletion by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/423
  • [mob] SaveOrEditPerson: Dismiss keyboard on tapping outside by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4263
  • [mob] Move manage device cache option from Advance to Free up space by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4265
  • [mob][photos] Fix UX issue with video controls when viewing a video memory by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4294
  • [mob][photos] Fix dialog that is supposed to be shown when turning off downloads coming up only when turning on downloads in manage link screen by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4284
  • [mob][photos] Fix state issue when reloading avatar (#4311) by @AlexisL61 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4312
  • [mob][photos] Remove 'Descriptions' section from search tab by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4317
  • [mob][photos] Fix clipping of TextInputWidget by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4318
  • [mob][photos] Fix safe area issues by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4321
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4277
  • [mob][photos] Bump up to v0.9.66 by @ashilkn in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4357
  • [mobile] New translations by @github-actions in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4354

New Contributors

  • @AlexisL61 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4312

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/photos-v0.9.65...photos-v0.9.66

entry.title: New release for Ente Photos: photos-v0.9.71
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [mob] Legacy Contact by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4366
  • [mob] Copy changes by @vishnukvmd in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4370
  • [mob] Copy and UX improvements by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4375
  • [mob] Bump version v0.9.70 by @ua741 in https://github.com/ente-io/ente/pull/4376

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ente-io/ente/compare/photos-v0.9.66...photos-v0.9.71
